original_title: Jan Saudek – V pekle svých vášní, ráj v nedohlednu
overview: Jan Saudek, Czechoslovakia’s most famous living photographer, is the subject of this often-shocking kaleidoscopic biopic by friend and colleague Adolf Zika. With an unblinking eye, Zika chronicles the drama-filled life and work of a controversial artist who, though little-known in the United States, has enjoyed international acclaim throughout his fifty-year career
title: Jan Saudek - Trapped By His Passions No Hope For Rescue
